trans-unit.source: Gets the current running state of the task.
trans-unit.target: Gets the current running state of the task.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are running, and completed.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are running, and completed.

trans-unit.source: Running means the task is currently running.
trans-unit.target: Running means the task is currently running.

trans-unit.source: Completed means the task has completed.
trans-unit.target: Completed means the task has completed.

trans-unit.source: The Completed state includes the case where the task exits successfully with exit code 0 and the cases where the system fails to start the task process due to scheduling errors or the retry limit has reached after numerous task failures.
trans-unit.target: The Completed state includes the case where the task exits successfully with exit code 0 and the cases where the system fails to start the task process due to scheduling errors or the retry limit has reached after numerous task failures.
